name: SPARKS (acidGRUNT)
description:
This is our Entry to the Cyberpunk Gamejam 2019 

Description:

You are hacking into the electric grid to shock the robots that are patrolling the rooms to catch you. 

Controls: 

Movement: WASD 

Interact: "E" or "space

Reset Level: "R" 

Art and Sound: Janne Luppi 

Code and Art: Stephan Grzelkowski

Music: “Mayhem” by Eric Matyas
